pages.text: Ingredients gathering is just as important as cooking itself.$(br2)Most crops added by Cuisine may be found in the wild with $(em)appropriate climate$(). Crops such as wheat, peanuts, sesame and soybean may drop from breaking vanilla grass.$(br2)A certain ingredients may only be found in $(em)trades with villagers$().
